title: Intelligent Conversational Agent Platform Training for Enhancing Digital Connectivity

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic digital tools and intermediate-level expertise in specialized domains (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Conducting offline classes in BYOD environments, with a focus on alternative learning support tools for limited internet access scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operational principles of intelligent conversational agents and digital connectivity optimization technologies.
Learners can design platform-based educational scenarios by applying the ASSURE model.
Learners can propose at least three teaching-learning strategies using conversational agents in limited internet environments.
Learners can analyze educational effectiveness using platform evaluation tools (surveys/expert validation).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
